content: विभवः {@--1@} Wealth, riches, property; अतनुषु विभवेषु ज्ञातयः संतु नाम <ls>Ś. 5. 8</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 69.</ls> {@--2@} Might, power, prowess, greatness; एतावान्मम मतिविभवः <ls>V. 2</ls>; वाग्विभवः <ls>Māl. 1. 26</ls>, <ls>R. 1. 9</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 21.</ls> {@--3@} Exalted position, rank, dignity. {@--4@} Magnanimity. {@--5@} Final beatitude, absolution.
